reviewtext: There's nothing like pulling out your Stowaway Keyboard and unfolding it in front of someone.  Their eyes will pop out of their heads.  It is an instant conversation piece and is practical to boot!I wish I used it more often. It saves time whenever inputting information into your Visor.The only gripe I have is that it would be even better if you could somehow lock the central hinge so that it would remain solid and you could easily and comfortably use it while on your lap.
